head.title: May 27-June 2; Suicide Bomber Kills 16 In Tel Aviv Attack

hedline.hl1: May 27-June 2; Suicide Bomber Kills 16 In Tel Aviv Attack

block.p: In the deadliest terror attack since the eruption of Israeli-Palestinian violence last fall, a suicide bomber killed at least 16 people and injured scores of others outside a crowded beachside club in Tel Aviv. Most victims were teenagers and young adults who were waiting on line to enter a nightspot popular with new immigrants in the southern part of the city. As the weekend began, Palestinians braced for retalliatory air strikes.
